description.message: Mouse Gestures! Quickly and easily navigate webpages using the mouse or keyboard.

long_description.message:
This Mouse Gestures extension allows you to move the mouse while holding the right mouse button to trigger actions, such as page navigation or tab management. Supports click-and-drag (mouse gesture), click-and-scroll (scroll gesture), click-and-click (rocker gesture), and keyboard shortcuts!

• Powerful customization of gestures (and custom actions!)
• supports diagonal gestures, syncing/import/export of settings
• Does not work on this extension website, or other built-in chrome pages due to security restrictions for extensions. But it does work on almost all http:// and https:// pages.

options_title.description: The title of the options page, at top and tab name

options_contents_actions.description: category type for all actions links

options_contents_settings.description: category type for all settings links

options_contents_more.description: category type for all external links

options_contents_status.description: link to open the status page

options_moreactions.description: Link to access more actions. These actions don't currently have a gesture assigned

options_note_updated.message: Clean Gestures has been updated to $VERSION$
options_note_updated.description: Notify that the extension has been updated

options_note_remindrate.message: Do you like Clean Gestures? Please $LINK$!
options_note_remindrate.description: Notify the user that they can rate this extension to help promote it

options_note_remindrate_link.description: Text for the link leading to the extension's page

options_note_print.message: Having trouble remembering all of the gestures that you have set up? Just print this page like normal for a cheatsheet!
options_note_print.description: Promote printing the page so users have a help sheet to remember all of the gestures

options_note_print_button.description: Label on the button to print the page

options_note_hidepageaction_button.description: Label on the button to hide the Clean Gestures icon in the url bar

options_welcome_1.message: You can get to this Options page by holding down the right mouse button and drawing an 'O' (try: right-down-left-up-right).

options_welcome_2.message: To set new gestures or actions click on the '+' buttons below.

options_welcome_3.message: Configure different options by clicking 'Settings' to the right or scrolling down to the bottom of the page.

link.example: translate Clean Gestures into your language

options_note_translate_link.message: translate Clean Gestures into your language

options_mousebutton_0.description: name for the 'left' mouse button (To replace $BUTTON$ variables below)

options_mousebutton_1.description: name for the 'middle' mouse button (To replace $BUTTON$ variables below)

options_mousebutton_2.description: name for the 'right' mouse button (To replace $BUTTON$ variables below)

options_button_startaddgesture.description: Label for a button to start setting up a new gesture

options_button_addcustomaction.description: Label for a button to start setting up a new custom action

options_addgesture_title.message: Set a gesture for the $ACTION$ action
options_addgesture_title.description: explanation of what you are doing (adding a gesture to a specific action) ($ACTION$ is replaced automatically by the action name, such as: History Back--so insert it untranslated in the appropriate place in the translation)

options_addgesture_instruct_1.message: Do one of the following gestures:
options_addgesture_instruct_1.description: instructions for making a gesture (just before bullet point list)

options_addgesture_instruct_2.message: Mouse Gesture: Hold down the $BUTTON$ mouse button and draw a gesture by moving the mouse, then release
options_addgesture_instruct_2.description: [bullet point] instructions for making a gesture (mouse) ($BUTTON$ is replaced automatically by the appropriate button name--above--so insert it untranslated in the appropriate place in the translation)

options_addgesture_instruct_3.message: Scroll Gesture: Hold down the $BUTTON$ mouse button and scroll the scroll-wheel
options_addgesture_instruct_3.description: [bullet point] instructions for making a gesture (scroll) ($BUTTON$ is replaced automatically by the appropriate button name--above--so insert it untranslated in the appropriate place in the translation)

options_addgesture_instruct_4.message: Rocker Gesture: Hold down any mouse button, then click another
options_addgesture_instruct_4.description: [bullet point] instructions for making a gesture (rocker)

options_addgesture_instruct_5.message: Keyboard Shortcut: Hold any modifier keys (or none), then press another key
options_addgesture_instruct_5.description: [bullet point] instructions for doing a keyboard shortcut

options_addgesture_overwrite.message: This gesture is already used by $ACTION$
options_addgesture_overwrite.description: warning message that a gesture will be overwritten ($ACTION$ is replaced automatically by the action name, such as: History Back--so insert it untranslated in the appropriate place in the translation)

options_button_tryagain.description: button to reject the gesture made and try to make a new one

options_button_overwrite.description: button to overwrite the gesture made to the new action

options_button_addgesture.description: button to add the new gesture to the action

context_with_selection.description: A short label for a gesture indicating that the gesture is only valid with a selection

context_not_selection.description: A short label for a gesture indicating that the gesture is not valid with a selection

context_on_link.description: A short label for a gesture indicating that the gesture is only valid starting on a link

context_not_link.description: A short label for a gesture indicating that the gesture is not valid on a link

context_on_image.description: A short label for a gesture indicating that the gesture is only valid starting on an image

context_not_image.description: A short label for a gesture indicating that the gesture is not valid on an image

context_not_links_images.description: A short label for a gesture indicating that the gesture is not valid starting on a link or an image

status_title.description: The title of the status page, at top and tab name

status_link_options.description: Link to go to the options page

status_button_reloadone.description: button to reload single broken page

status_button_reloadall.description: button to reload all broken pages

status_window_this.description: title for a group of tab statuses

status_window_other.description: title for a group of tab statuses

popup_status_working_short.description: short text saying that gestures are working on this page.

popup_status_working.message: Gestures are working on this page.

popup_status_broken_short.description: short text saying that gestures are broken on this page.

popup_status_broken.message: Gestures are not working on this page right now.

popup_status_unable_short.description: short text saying that gestures are blocked by this page.

popup_status_blocked_1.message: Chrome blocks extensions from running on this page as a security precaution.

popup_status_blocked_newtab2.message: Try $LINK$ to enable gestures on the New Tab page.
popup_status_blocked_newtab2.description: text explaining how to make a newtab page work

popup_status_blocked_newtab2_link.description: text naming the extension that adds newtab functionality to Clean Gestures

popup_status_blocked_file2.message: To get Clean Gestures to work on file:// and ftp:// protocols, go to $LINK$ and mark "Allow access to file URLs" under the Clean Gestures entry.
popup_status_blocked_file2.description: text explaining how to make a file:// tab work

popup_status_blocked_file2_link.description: text naming the link that goes to chrome://extensions/

popup_button_options.description: a button to go to the options page

popup_button_hidepageaction.description: a button to hide the pageaction

popup_button_reload.description: a button to reload the current page

setting_group_newtab.description: title of a group of settings

setting_group_trail.description: title of a group of settings

setting_group_context.description: title of a group of settings

setting_group_assorted.description: title of a group of settings

setting_group_show.description: button to show a group of settings

setting_group_hide.description: button to hide a group of settings

setting_reset_descrip.message: Set all gestures and settings to the default values

setting_force_context_descrip.message: Blocks gestures starting from links. On systems with context menu conflicts this allows the right mouse button to be clicked only once, instead of twice to get to the context menu. However, it also disables the New Tab from Link feature.

setting_force_context2_descrip.message: Always show the context menu on right click. Useful for middle button activated gestures.

setting_closelastblock_descrip.message: Don't close the last tab with the close tab gesture; instead, go to the New Tab URL.

setting_selecttolink_descrip.message: Select text with one or more urls as input to a linking gesture. For example: select 2 urls in text, perform the New Tab from Link gesture -- both urls will open in two new tabs.

setting_sendstats_descrip.message: Send an anonymous gesture usage report to inform the program of the most commonly used gestures, thereby influencing the default gestures of future releases.

setting_hidepageaction_descrip.message: The icon in the URL bar allows quick access to this Clean Gestures options page. Alternatively, you can find this page at Wrench > Tools > Extensions > Clean Gestures > Options

setting_blacklist_descrip.message: Disables gestures on domains included in the blacklist. Separate domains with commas. (Example: "mail.google.com, www.example.com")

setting_hold_button_descrip.message: Allows drawing gestures with the middle or left mouse button, instead of the right mouse button.

setting_trail_color_descrip.message: Adjust the color and transparency of the line drawn when you make a gesture.

setting_newtab_url_descrip.message: Set the URL that the New Tab action goes to.

setting_newtab_linkright.message: Link-sourced New Tabs Open Next to Current

setting_newtab_linkright_descrip.message: Similar to Chromium's default behavior when opening links in a new tab. This tends to group tabs together by topic. (Useful for Split and Merge Tabs; see above)

setting_newtab_right.message: New Tabs Open Next to Current

setting_newtab_right_descrip.message: New tabs (not from links) open next to the current tab.

setting_trail_width_descrip.message: Adjust the width of the line drawn when you make a gesture.

setting_trail_draw_descrip.message: Draw a trailing line to the screen whenever gestures are being drawn.

setting_sync_descrip.message: Synchronize settings and gestures with other computers through bookmarks. To use this feature you must also enable bookmark synchronization.

setting_import_descrip.message: Save your current settings (including gestures, custom actions, and options). Load the file to restore lost settings or move settings to another computer

setting_disabled.description: choose no mouse button (gestures are disabled)

setting_button_import.description: button to load a settings file

setting_button_export.description: button to save settings as a backup file

setting_warning_reset.message: Are you sure you want to reset? You will lose all of your custom settings.
setting_warning_reset.description: warn that setting will be lost during a reset

descrip_page_back.message: Go back one page in history for the current tab

descrip_page_forward.message: Go forward one page for the current tab

descrip_reload_tab.message: Refresh the contents of the current tab

descrip_reload_tab_full.message: Fully refresh the contents of the current tab (skip the cache)

descrip_stop.message: Stop loading the current tab. (May not work on some pages, like image pages)

descrip_view_source.message: View the source code of the current page

descrip_new_tab.message: Open a new tab in the current window (the URL can be set below)

descrip_new_tab_link.message: Start a gesture on a link to open that link in a new tab

descrip_new_tab_back.message: Start a gesture on a link to open that link in a new tab, but don't view the new tab yet

descrip_navigate_tab.message: Navigate to the New Tab page (the URL can be set below)

descrip_undo_close.message: Open the last closed tab. This only loads the URL of the page.

descrip_undo_close_hack.message: Open the last closed tab. Load the history through the use of an imperfect workaround

descrip_new_window.message: Open a new window with the one default tab

descrip_close_window.message: Close all tabs in the currently selected window

descrip_prev_tab.message: Select the tab to the left of the current tab

descrip_next_tab.message: Select the tab to the right of the current tab

descrip_split_tabs.message: Split all tabs to the right of (and including) the current tab into a new window

descrip_merge_tabs.message: Merge all of the tabs of the current window with those of the last focused window

descrip_status.message: Open the Clean Gestures extension status page

descrip_page_back_close.message: Go back one page in history for the current tab; or, if no history remains, close the tab

descrip_page_next.message: Try to go to the next page by following a link with the text: 'next'

descrip_page_prev.message: Try to go to the previous page by following a link with the text: 'previous'

descrip_clone_tab.message: Open a duplicate tab of the current page. The duplicate tab will not have the history of the original tab.

descrip_clone_tab_hack.message: Open a duplicate tab of the current page. Load the history with an imperfect workaround

descrip_prev_window.message: Select the window focused immediately before the current window

descrip_next_window.message: Select the window that was focused longest ago

descrip_maximize_x.message: This is a messy hack to simulate maximizing a window

descrip_minimize_x.message: This is a _very_ messy hack to simulate minimizing a window

descrip_parent_dir.message: Navigate to the parent directory of the current page. If already at the root directory, try to remove subdomains.

descrip_new_window_link.message: Start a gesture on a link to open that link in a new window

descrip_tab_to_left.message: Move the current tab once to the left

descrip_tab_to_right.message: Move the current tab once to the right

descrip_zoom_in.message: Zoom in on all of the content of the page.

descrip_zoom_out.message: Zoom out on all of the content of the page.

descrip_zoom_zero.message: Undo the previous zoom actions to the page.

descrip_zoom_img_in.message: Zoom in on the image that the mouse is over

descrip_zoom_img_out.message: Zoom out on the image that the mouse is over

descrip_zoom_img_zero.message: Set the image to its original size before zoom

descrip_open_history.message: Open the history page in a new tab

descrip_open_downloads.message: Open the downloads page in a new tab

descrip_open_extensions.message: Open the extensions page in a new tab

descrip_open_bookmarks.message: Open the bookmark manager in a new tab

descrip_open_image.message: Open the image that the mouse is over in a new tab

descrip_hide_image.message: Remove the image that the mouse is over from the page

descrip_show_cookies.message: Show a list of all of the cookies for the current page

descrip_search_sel.message: Search Google for the selected text

descrip_close_other_tabs.message: Close all tabs in the current window, except for the selected tab

descrip_close_left_tabs.message: Close all tabs to the left of the current tab

descrip_close_right_tabs.message: Close all tabs to the right of the current tab

descrip_reload_all_tabs.message: Refresh all of the tabs in the current window

descrip_translate.message: Translate the selected text to Chrome's default language

descrip_toggle_pin.message: Toggle the pinned state of the tab

descrip_copy.message: Copy selected text to the clipboard.

descrip_toggle_bookmark.message: Removes a bookmark if one is already set. Adds a bookmark to current page if it isn't.

descrip_bookmark.message: Add a bookmark to the current page.

descrip_unbookmark.message: Removes a bookmark to the current page, if one exists.

cat_page_navigation.description: Name of category encompassing basic page navigation actions

cat_tab_management.description: Name of category encompassing tab manipulation actions

cat_utilities.description: Name of category for general utility actions

cat_other.description: Name of category for actions that don't have a category

cat_custom.description: Name of category for all custom actions
